title: Pixel (orig) was charging playing Netflix, I woke up an it was black and wouldnt turn on
content: Pixel (orig) was charging playing Netflix, I woke up an it was black and wouldnt turn on. Tried: holding power button, removing case, letting cool off, read instructions to charge (no battery symbol display, no red light), held for 30 seconds and attempted to ring through find my device on my tablet and it never connected, attempted hard restart by holding let and vol down and screen still black.
